txt.en: 'All who have ventured into the woods of late have quickly returned home because of the half-orc scouts, but I have found the source of them!\n\n'Look at this great encampment, [placeholder]. What should we do about this?'
You have defeated a number of Half-orcs near Grimslade, but there are too many to uproot the entire encampment. You have done all that you could here.
Half-orcs are growing in number in the woods near Grimslade, and HÃºnbrit has found the source: a large encampment.
You have defeated a number of Half-orcs near Grimslade, but there are too many to uproot the entire encampment. You have done all that you could here.
Half-orcs can be found in their encampment south-east from the gates of Grimslade.\n\nYou should defeat Half-orcs at Fushum Raus.
